attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
You've been in the top 2 in government for over 10 years. In that time you've screwed every penny possible out of us, infringed on our privacy & libery at every opportunity. Even with the £600 BILLION you take and spend every year, we all know the NHS and Education systems are falling apart due to your waste. Law and order is a joke, except to criminals who can do as they please. You've created a sponger state.

So please - just go, we don't like you, we don't want you.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
